data.name: CC_Callscript_Control
data.comment: Agent script control name

data.name: CC_FieldControl
data.comment: Input property name

data.name: CC_FieldControl_Desc
data.comment: Input property description

data.name: CompletedMacroStep_AccessibilityLabel
data.comment: When macro execution step completed successfully

data.name: CompletedScriptStep_AccessibilityLabel
data.comment: When script step loading completed successfully

data.name: CompletedTextStep_AccessibilityLabel
data.comment: When text instruction step completed successfully

data.name: ControlHeader
data.comment: Header value for callscript control

data.name: ControlHeaderInfo
data.value: Aracı betikleri, müşteri işleme bakımından hız ve verimlilik kazandırırken doğru ve etkili olmanıza yardımcı olur
data.comment: Info value for callscript control

data.name: FailedMacroStep_AccessibilityLabel
data.comment: When macro execution step failed

data.name: FailedScriptStep_AccessibilityLabel
data.comment: When script step loading fails

data.name: FailedTextStep_AccessibilityLabel
data.comment: When text instruction step failed

data.name: InitialScriptDataLoadFailure
data.value: Temsilci hazır metinleri oluşturulmadı veya yüklenemedi. Lütfen yöneticinize başvurun.
data.comment: Generic error message when initial script data load fails

data.name: LoadButtonLabel
data.comment: Button label for Load button

data.name: LoadingText
data.comment: Loading text to show when data fetch is in progress

data.name: MacroStepFailure_AccessibilityMessage
data.value: {0} adımı için makro başarısız oldu. Lütfen yöneticinize başvurun.
data.comment: Screen reader message when macro execution failed

data.name: MacroStepFailure_ErrorMessageWithError
data.comment: Error message to show when macro execution failed

data.name: MacroStepFailure_ErrorMessageWithoutError
data.value: Makro başarısız oldu. Lütfen yöneticinize başvurun.
data.comment: Generic error message to show when macro execution failed

data.name: MacroStepSuccess_AccessibilityMessage
data.comment: Screen reader message when macro execution successful

data.name: NoCallScriptFoundErrorMessage
data.value: Geçerli oturumla bağlantılı Aracı hazır metni yok
data.comment: Error message when no agent scripts are linked with session template

data.name: ScriptActionStepLabel
data.comment: Label for script action step

data.name: ScriptCombobox_EmptyOption
data.comment: Label for empty option in script select combobox

data.name: ScriptStepsDataLoadFailure
data.value: Aracı hazır metni ayrıntılarını yükleyemedik. Lütfen yöneticinize başvurun.
data.comment: Generic error message when script steps data load fails

data.name: SlugResolutionFailure
data.value: {0} adımında değiştirilebilir parametre çözümlenemedi. Lütfen yöneticinize başvurun.
data.comment: Error message when slug resolution fails

data.name: StepExecutionBtn_LabelForNotExecutedStep
data.comment: Button text to prompt user to execute a step

data.name: StepExecutionBtn_LabelForStepInProgress
data.comment: Disabled button text to be displayed on a step in progress

data.name: StepExeutionBtn_LabelForRouteAction
data.comment: Button text to prompt user to view configured route callscript

data.name: StepExeutionBtn_LabelForTextAction
data.comment: Button text to Mark a text step as done

data.name: StepListItem_UnexecutedMacroStepAccessibilityLabel
data.comment: Text to be read by screen-reader on callscript step focus

data.name: StepListItem_UnexecutedRouteStepAccessibilityLabel
data.comment: Text to be read by screen-reader on callscript step focus

data.name: StepListItem_UnexecutedTextStepAccessibilityLabel
data.comment: Text to be read by screen-reader on callscript step focus

data.name: NoDataCallScriptMessage
data.comment: Error message when no relative agent scripts are linked with session template

data.name: SlugResolutionErrorMessage
data.comment: Error message when there is a slug resolution error

data.name: SelectAgentScript_ComboboxLabel
data.comment: Text to define the combobox name as select agent script and it will only be read by screen-reader on combobox focus
